description:
This certified organic conditioner delivers deep nourishment to balanced hair. The concentrated formula means a small amount goes a long way. Lather it up and let the Good Juju take hold!

  • 100% natural, certified organic ingredients
  • Vegan
  • Single bar last up to 75 washes
  • Ingredients: Behentrimonium methosulfate, cetyl alcohol, butylene glycol, cetearyl alcohol, organic cocoa seed butter, organic jojoba seed oil, organic coconut oil, organic argan oil, organic broccoli seed oil, panthenol, organic sacha inchi seed oil, organic glycerin, organic lemongrass essential oil, organic bergamot essential oil, organic sage essential oil, hydrolyzed rice protein, organic snow mushroom extract, vitamin E, chlorophyll pigment
name: Good Juju Conditioner Bar Balanced Hair - Unisex
